Gustav - Blink Moment Deck
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Characters: Gustav - Blink Moment Deck
By Farmer Jimbo on Thursday, August 24, 2000 - 02:11 pm:

Gustav is a big fan of the "Lock Tight" card. Be ready to block it or replace it.
